title: [Marienna's Market, East]
description: Displayed on a low case set along the front window, fashionable headwear for gentleman has been artfully arranged.  A half-curtain of wispy lace allows in thin beams of moonlight, hazy with motes of dust from the volcano ash.  Other racks, shelves, tables and counters contain various items for the discriminating male.

Displayed on a low case set along the front window, fashionable caps and hats for gentleman have been artfully arranged.  A half-curtain of wispy lace allows in thin beams of sunlight, filled with dancing motes of dust from the volcano ash.  Other racks, shelves, tables and counters contain various items for the discriminating male.
